text: I am a Software Engineer currently living in the Tampa Bay area, passionate about designing and building the technologies that will shape the future.

I love developing beautiful, high quality, and functional websites and applications. This website was designed and developed by myself using Vue.js for the front-end and Ruby on Rails for the back-end.
Currently employed at KnowBe4 as a Junior Software Engineer. When I'm not writing code I enjoy playing guitar, cooking, exercising, traveling... and leveling up my skills to be a better developer!
Feel free to reach out and say hi!
